contents.item: We glorify God when we appreciate humans
Everything in existence has a purpose
Always appreciate the good in people
Love is the primary nature of God
The best way to worship God is to honor His people
The nature of Christ is love
Glorifying people is the most noble act
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
What is done unto people is also being done unto God
We only perceive God when we receive people
We glorify God only as we celebrate people
Our attitude to others dictates God’s attitude to us
People-based service is God-based service
Man is the centrality of God’s purpose on earth
Love others the way God loves you
You must be a servant if you want to be great in life
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
The material of life is made from time
When we allow people to fellowship with us, God welcomes us into fellowshipping with Him
Don’t fellowship with people around you alone, explore and reach out to more people
An effective life is a fulfilled one
Life is all about purpose
Only loving people who love you isn’t profitable
Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
Celebrate people irrespective of their status or position
You recognize God when you begin to recognize people
Appreciate others so that you can be appreciated
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
We are only qualified for God’s glory when we glorify people
Fellowship and interaction with people opens up God’s heart to us
Direct your attention to people; love, help and care for them
God uses His people as instruments for breakthrough
Look for people around you and serve them with love and compassion
When we relate with people, we indirectly relate with God
There is always something to appreciate in people
Celebrating God in people should be part of our lives as Christians
When you begin to serve people, salvation locates you
Your solution is in the next person
Our fellowship with God cannot be established when we don’t recognize His people
God is a God of glory
Love is the greatest attribute of God
You love God by showing love to His creations
God is a God of appreciation
Good things come your way when you serve the people around you
You dishonor God when you don’t treat His people with love
Our fellowship with people brings us closer to the Kingdom
Our fellowship is with God when we have mutual fellowship with one another
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
Find people in worse situations than you and help them anyway you can
The ministry of Christ is related to fellowshipping with people
God will not come from Heaven to help us, but He’ll use the people around us for that
You cannot fellowship with God when you disqualify another person from fellowshipping with you
You can only see God when you notice people
We are carriers of God
We open our hearts to receive God when we open our hearts to people
God treats us the same way we treat one another
Love for people is the basis of our fellowship with God
Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
See God in everyone regardless of who or where they are
The real service to God is when it involves people in need
We glorify God when we celebrate people’s gifts
Everyone deserves to be in our fellowship
Never disregard people, regardless of their beliefs, because we all carry God’s likeness
Life is more than survival
When you begin to serve people, God begins to serve you
Do not restrain yourself from fellowshipping with people, regardless of their age or status
God is in your neighbor
Man is not made for the Sabbath. Rather, the Sabbath is made for man
The image of God is in every human
Love is about sharing
Employment is a vicious cycle
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
When you love your neighbor, you won’t have problems with embracing them
Serving people with love and compassion is the best way to bring them to Christ
God is connected to people
Time is the raw material for creation
There is no love for God without love for man
You cannot receive God when you block people from your life
We reject God when we reject people
We are all qualified to fellowship with God no matter our situation or condition
Service to humanity has no alternative
The only way to love God is by loving His people
The principle of God is love
The people around you are the instruments that God will use to help you
Our fellowship is with God and His people
You cannot appreciate God without appreciating people
God is after the truth in your worship
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
We are all equal in the sight of the creator
